QueryViewSpec.Name: BFAS Relationship Change Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: A custom view to extrach change data from the relationship audit table
QueryViewSpec.Author: rayporter

TVFImplementation.CreateFunctionSQL: CREATE FUNCTION dbo.USR_BFAS_UFN_RELATIONSHIPCHANGE_QUERY ( @ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER = NULL ) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN( SELECT TOP 1 A.AUDITID AS ID, (case A.AUDITTYPECODE when 2 then 'Delete' else 'Update' end) as CHANGETYPE, A.AUDITDATE as AUDITCHANGEDATE, A.AUDITKEY, A.AUDITRECORDID, A.AUDITCHANGEAGENTID, CA.APPLICATIONNAME, CA.USERNAME as AUDIT_CHANGEDBY_USERNAME, A.DATEADDED, A.DATECHANGED FROM dbo.RELATIONSHIPAUDIT AS A LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.CHANGEAGENT AS CA ON A.AUDITCHANGEAGENTID=CA.ID WHERE A.AUDITTYPECODE = 1 AND A.AUDITRECORDID = @ID )
